sentences.english: But in a culture that reveres age, some villagers refer to him dismissively as a "lad".
sentences.chinese: 在尊敬长者的文化中，一些村民对他轻蔑的称为青年。

sentences.english: He bridled up when his enemy spoke to him.
sentences.chinese: 敌人对他说话时，他昂首收颌以示轻蔑。

sentences.english: He was howled away when stepping into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他刚一走进屋就被轻蔑的吼叫声轰了出来。

sentences.english: The boatman nodded towards the north of the bay with some disdain.
sentences.chinese: 船老大略带轻蔑神情朝海湾北部点了点头。

sentences.english: In this tone of contempt, or sarcasm, it’s weird.
sentences.chinese: 他那个腔调又是轻蔑又是嘲讽，真是奇怪。

sentences.english: The crowd hooted and jeered at the speaker.
sentences.chinese: 群众向那演讲人发出轻蔑的叫嚣和嘲笑。

sentences.english: I feel the deepest contempt and loathing for him.
sentences.chinese: 我为他感到最深的轻蔑和厌憎。

sentences.english: She withered him with a scornful look .
sentences.chinese: 她轻蔑的一瞥使他感到羞惭。

sentences.english: We often speak of tramps with contempt and put them in the same class as beggars
sentences.chinese: 说起流浪汉，我们常常带着轻蔑。

sentences.english: Don't think too high of yourself and belittle others, you'll pay for it.
sentences.chinese: 别太高估自己而轻蔑别人，那是要付出代价的。

sentences.english: He curled his lips in disdain.
He tried to say it dismissively.
sentences.chinese: 他试图表现出轻蔑地口吻。

sentences.english: Brook It implies self-assertion and defiance.
He felt disdain for worldly pleasures and was totally guileless , like a child. But he had a violent temper.
sentences.chinese: 他轻蔑世间的欢乐，像孩子一样地坦率，但脾气暴躁。

sentences.english: She still loved Mr. Keble, but felt a touch of contempt.
sentences.chinese: 她虽然还爱着基布尔先生，但对他有了一丝轻蔑。

sentences.english: It is the hour of great contempt.

definition: to disdain to do sth/to think sth not worth doing/to feel it beneath one's dignity
to tease/to poke fun at/to make fun of
to sneer/to laugh grimly/grin of dissatisfaction (bitterness, helplessness, indignation etc)/bitter, grim, sarcastic or angry smile
to despise/to disdain/to look down upon
not in the least concerned (idiom)/reckless/couldn't give a damn about it/unperturbed/couldn't care less/harum scarum
